hudson.plugins.analysis.core

Class GlobalSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • hudson.model.listeners.RunListener<hudson.model.Run<?,?>>
      • hudson.plugins.analysis.core.GlobalSettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    hudson.ExtensionPoint, hudson.model.Describable<GlobalSettings>

    @Extension
public class GlobalSettings
extends hudson.model.listeners.RunListener<hudson.model.Run<?,?>>
implements hudson.model.Describable<GlobalSettings>
    Global settings common to all static analysis plug-ins. The actual extension point RunListener is not used yet, this object is only used to provide a model for the view global.jelly.
    Since:
    1.50
    Author:
    Ulli Hafner
